name: LD45 No Bread for the Hungry
name_original: LD45 No Bread for the Hungry
description:
Setting
You are starving but the richest of the rich are kind of generous. Beg for your livelyhood and acquire riches beyond your wildest imaginations. But beware the town guards are not happy with your kind, beggars are not allowed in the high city.

Control
move : WASD or Arrow Keys

sprint : hold SHIFT

beg : press ENTER

buy : press right CTRL

Devlog

- Web version added (no differences between the ludum dare release)
